description: Sample query policy that will run seven queries and email the results as per the template configuration.

queries.name: docker-images
queries.description: Find all running Docker image based containers
queries.sql: SELECT ad.* FROM application_detail ad JOIN ( SELECT foundation, MAX(collection_time) AS latest_time FROM application_detail GROUP BY foundation ) t ON ad.foundation = t.foundation AND ad.collection_time = t.latest_time WHERE ad.running_instances > 0 AND ad.requested_state = 'started' AND ad.image IS NOT NULL

queries.name: all-apps-pushed-and-still-running-in-the-last-week
queries.description: Find all running applications pushed in the last week excluding the system organization
queries.sql: SELECT ad.* FROM application_detail ad JOIN ( SELECT foundation, MAX(collection_time) AS latest_time FROM application_detail GROUP BY foundation ) t ON ad.foundation = t.foundation AND ad.collection_time = t.latest_time WHERE ad.running_instances > 0 AND ad.requested_state = 'started' AND WEEK(ad.last_pushed) = WEEK(CURRENT_DATE) - 1 AND YEAR(ad.last_pushed) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) AND ad.organization NOT IN ('system')

queries.name: all-single-instance-apps
queries.description: Find all running single instance applications
queries.sql: SELECT ad.* FROM application_detail ad JOIN ( SELECT foundation, MAX(collection_time) AS latest_time FROM application_detail GROUP BY foundation ) t ON ad.foundation = t.foundation AND ad.collection_time = t.latest_time WHERE ad.running_instances = 1 AND ad.requested_state = 'started'

email-notification-template.subject: Query Policy Sample Report
email-notification-template.body: Results are herewith attached for your consideration.
